Observed at: Jasper Warden Station 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Flurries beginning early this afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
